title: Torque - two forces are exerted on a bar

content.question: A bar of length <math alttext="1.0 meter" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1.0</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>m</mtext></math> sits on a pivot located at its center.
